seo.title: In-Store Retail Media Report
seo.description: Retail media isn't just about on-site and off-site. Physical stores are now central to how leading retailers generate revenue, engage shoppers, and attract brand spend. If your retail media network doesn't include in-store, it isn't complete. Renowned retail expert Colin Lewis explores the key drivers behind the rise of in-store retail media and what it takes to succeed.

title: Your stores aren't just for shopping — they're already media hubs.
Are you maximizing their value?
intro.par: Retail media isn't just about on-site and off-site. Physical stores are now central to how leading retailers generate revenue, engage shoppers, and attract brand spend. If your retail media network doesn't include in-store, it isn't complete. Renowned retail expert Colin Lewis explores the key drivers behind the rise of in-store retail media and what it takes to succeed.

list.title: The state of in-store retail media
list.desc: Understand where in-store fits within the retail media ecosystem, what's driving its growth, and how big the opportunity is.

list.title: Formats, technology, and execution
list.desc: Explore in-store formats, from shelf-edge screens to full-store wraps, and the enabling tech like Bluetooth, RFID, and AI.

list.title: Strategy and monetization
list.desc: Learn how to connect in-store with digital channels and explore pricing models and the challenges of scaling physical space as media.

list.title: Competitive positioning
list.desc: Compare in-store advertising to online, offline, and DOOH advertising and see where it offers a clear edge.

list.title: Expectations and measurement
list.desc: Discover what advertisers expect, how to prove ROI, and what's next for in-store campaigns over the next 24 months.

ctaBox.title: Build a stronger, smarter retail media network… in-store and beyond!
ctaBox.par: Whether you're refining your approach or catching up to competitors, this guide shares actionable insights to help you build a retail media network that works as hard in-store as it does online.

formHeader: Build a stronger, smarter retail media network… in-store and beyond!
